choose_the_plan_that_works_for_you_no_hi: 選擇適合您的方案。沒有隱藏費用。
dictate_four_times_faster_using_your_voi: 使用語音聽寫，速度快四倍。
here_s_a_really_long_sentence_that_i_hav: 這是一個非常長的句子，我必須把它打出來，而且它一直延續下去。
install_voquill_on_macos_windows_or_linu: 在 macOS、Windows 或 Linux 上安裝 Voquill，今天就開始使用 AI 聽寫。
installer_for_all_macos_architectures: 適用於所有 macOS 架構的安裝程式
make_voice_your_new_keyboard: 讓語音成為您的新鍵盤。
make_voice_your_new_keyboard_type_four_t: 讓語音成為您的新鍵盤。使用語音打字快四倍。Voquill 是 WisprFlow 的開源替代方案。
one_voice_every_app: 一個聲音。每個應用程式。
other_dictation_tools_send_your_audio_st: Other dictation tools send your audio straight to the cloud. Voquill can run entirely on your device — your words never leave your machine. Airplane mode, off the grid, wherever. It just works.
process_everything_locally_on_your_devic: Process everything locally on your device, bring your own API key, or connect to our cloud. Don't believe us? See for yourself. Voquill is fully open-source.
sorry_we_couldn_t_find_that_page: 抱歉，我們找不到該頁面。
type_four_times_faster_with_a_voice_firs: 使用語音優先鍵盤，打字速度快四倍。
voquill_is_built_in_the_open_join_our_di: Voquill is built in the open. Join our Discord to share feedback, request features, report bugs, or just hang out with other users. We're building this together.
voquill_uses_ai_to_clean_up_your_transcr: Voquill 使用 AI 清理您的轉錄內容。它會移除填充詞、猶豫、錯誤開頭等。自然地說話，Voquill 會處理其餘的。
voquill_works_system_wide_across_macos_w: Voquill 在 macOS、Windows 和 Linux 上系統範圍內運作。任何文字欄位，任何應用程式——您的聲音都能使用。
voquill_your_keyboard_is_holding_you_bac: Voquill | 您的鍵盤正在拖累您
we_couldn_t_find_the_page_you_were_looki: 我們找不到您要尋找的頁面。
works_at_the_speed_of_thought: Works at the speed of thought.
your_data_is_yours_period: 您的資料屬於您。就這樣。
your_thoughts_move_faster_than_your_fing: Your thoughts move faster than your fingers ever will. Stop losing ideas to slow typing. Say what you're thinking and move on.
